title: How to write a division expression - Quora

response.answer_text: Example: If it took 9 hours to drive 450 km, what was the average speed?450 / 9 = 50 kilometers per hourMost computer languages use the format: result = expression 50 = 450 / 9But people often explain using the format: expression = result: 450 / 9 = 50 Other kinds of division expression:Eastern Division people work 10% longer than Midwestern Division people.Dividing people by nationality can produce unfortunate results.
